snippet: With Magic Johnson, the position of Dodgers owner has gone from reviled to revered as the team seeks to become a force again in the Los Angeles market.
abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers are looking to become a force again after new group of owners, including revered NBA icon Magic Johnson, spent $2.15 billion for the team; president Stan Kasten hopes to restore the club's brand.
lead_paragraph: With Magic Johnson, the position of Dodgers owner has gone from reviled to revered as the team seeks to become a force again in the Los Angeles market.

headline.seo: New Owners Aim to Restore Dodgers to Relevance
headline.main: Rallying Dodgers, One Cap at a Time
headline.print_headline: Rallying Dodgers, One Cap at a Time
